name: Area-21
description:
You're a thief, breaking into a storage facility. You're tasked with collecting up to 3 artifacts, without being detected.

Stealing the artifacts won't be easy! There're are a few obstacles that will challenge your problem solving skills and try to prevent you from completing your task. 

Controls:

  • Arrows or WASD - Moving
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • E- interact
  • Mouse - Look
